articles.description:
Let’s compare #Bitcoin’s price on the 2nd of May for the past 3 years:
2022: $38,681
2021: $56,605
2020: $8,982
How much will 1 $BTC be next year?

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 9/ What went wrong? 
⛽️ Gas fees were extremely high, reaching around 2ETH 
The mint was so large that Etherscan crashed 🤯
Find out more about what happened here:
Yuga Labs: We wanted to say a few words about the mint tonight. 🧵

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 8/ The collection was originally planned to drop as a Dutch Auction format for sale
In this type of auction, the mint price gradually falls over time, but they declared that these auctions were BS
OthersideMeta: Dutch auctions are actually bullshit, so Otherdeeds will be sold for a flat price of 305 ApeCoin 🧵.
articles.title: Re 8/ The collection was originally planned to drop as a Dutch Auction format for sale In this type of auction, the mint price gradually falls over ti...

articles.description:

If you didn't do this, you wouldn't be able to mint the NFT
